    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet RoomCharacteristics_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomCharacteristics_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RoomCharacteristics compositeInd="true" nonSmokingInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <LocationCode>Annex room</LocationCode>
    <AccessibilityFeature description="Door locks at wheelchair height." quantity="2">
        <DisabilityFeature_Enum>Accessibility to goods and services</DisabilityFeature_Enum>
    </AccessibilityFeature>
    <SecurityFeature description="Smoke alarm in room." quantity="1">
        <SecurityFeature>2nd lock on guest doors</SecurityFeature>
    </SecurityFeature>
    <BedTypeCode>Dorm bed</BedTypeCode>
    <Category>Budget</Category>
    <ClassificationCode>1 room cabin</ClassificationCode>
    <ViewCode>Annex room</ViewCode>
</RoomCharacteristics>

      Example JSON

      {
  "RoomCharacteristicsSummary" : {
    "nonSmokingInd" : true,
    "compositeInd" : true,
    "LocationCode" : {
      "value" : "Annex room"
    },
    "AccessibilityFeature" : [ {
      "@type" : "AccessibilityFeature",
      "quantity" : 2,
      "description" : "Door locks at wheelchair height.",
      "DisabilityFeature_Enum" : {
        "value" : "Accessibility to goods and services"
      }
    } ],
    "SecurityFeature" : [ {
      "@type" : "SecurityFeature",
      "quantity" : 1,
      "description" : "Smoke alarm in room.",
      "SecurityFeature" : {
        "value" : "2nd lock on guest doors"
      }
    } ],
    "BedTypeCode" : {
      "value" : "Dorm bed"
    },
    "Category" : {
      "value" : "Budget"
    },
    "ClassificationCode" : {
      "value" : "1 room cabin"
    },
    "ViewCode" : {
      "value" : "Annex room"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        LocationCode
        Indicates the location of the room within the hotel structure. Typical values would be "Near Exit","Close to elevator", "Low Floor" or "High Floor". Refer to OpenTravel Code List Room Location Type (RLT).
        Details
        Type RoomLocation_Enum
        Example Value Annex room
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        AccessibilityFeature
        Accessibility features of the room.
        Details
        Type AccessibilityFeature
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        SecurityFeature
        Security features of the room.
        Details
        Type SecurityFeature
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        BedTypeCode
        Indicates the type of bed(s) found in the room. Typical values would be Double, Twin, Queen, or King. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Bed Type Code (BED).
        Details
        Type BedType_Enum
        Example Value Dorm bed
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Category
        Indicates the category of the room. Typical values would be Moderate, Standard, or Deluxe. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Segment Category Code (SEG).
        Details
        Type SegmentCategory_Enum
        Example Value Budget
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ClassificationCode
        Specifies the room classification (e.g., cabin, apartment). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Guest Room Info (GRI).
        Details
        Type GuestRoomInfo
        Example Value 1 room cabin
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ViewCode
        Indicates the view of the room. Typical values would be "Ocean view", "Pool view" or "Garden View". Refer to OpenTravel Code List Room View Type (RVT).
        Details
        Type RoomViewType_Enum
        Example Value Annex room
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        nonSmokingInd
        Non-smoking indicator.
        compositeInd
        Indicates that the room (suite) is a composite of smaller units.
